references.name: Ron Rock
references.reference: He is a very different type of guy. He is remarkably smart and can pick up any technology at the drop of a hat.

references.name: Ron Rock
references.reference: He gained the respect of everyone in the pit by being one of the hardest working guys on the floor.

references.name: Ismail Amzovski
references.reference: I would rather have a team of Buzz's than a whole company of brown nosers.
